New Records: Cade Cunningham led the Pistons to a 118-115 win, their first.500 record since 2019
Key Match Events: Cade Cunningham's clutch performance, Tim Hardaway Jr.'s key shots, Jalen Duren's crucial putback
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Chauncey Billups was honored before the game for his contributions to the 2004 championship
Post-Match Reflections: The Pistons' win marked a significant milestone in their season, ending a long drought of being.500 after New Year's
Miscellaneous Highlights: Portland's strong start was countered by Detroit's late-game surge, highlighting defensive and offensive strategies
